title: Tools and Vocabularies for Enabling GIS-Linked Analytics in OMOP CDM
text: OMOP GIS (Geographic Information System) Vocabulary Package designed elevate data-driven healthcare research enabling integration spatial, environmental, behavioral, socioeconomic, phenotypic, toxin-related determinants health standardized data structures. Features: - OMOP GIS Vocabulary - OMOP Exposome Vocabulary - OMOP SDoH (Social Determinants Health) Vocabulary Find Delta Vocabulary files Vocabulary Package

title: Tools and Vocabularies for Enabling GIS-Linked Analytics in OMOP CDM
text: Instructions quickly install start using Gaia

title: Tools and Vocabularies for Enabling GIS-Linked Analytics in OMOP CDM
text: Prerequisite: solution requires Docker Docker Compose installed. See . Containerized instances gaiaDB (geospatial data store) gaiaCore R package (built Broadsea Hades wrapped HTTP API via Plumber) can quickly deployed connected using Docker Compose gaiaCore R Package wrapped HTTP API. can test service started running specified port /hello endpoint, load variable gaiaDB /load endpoint Configure database connection details HTTP API port .env file docker directory. time, images published built docker compose run: gaiaDB image built Dockerfile gaiaDB repository. gaiaCore image built Dockerfile docker directory repository.
code: git clone git@github.com:OHDSI/GIS.git  cd GIS  docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yaml up -d curl "http://localhost:8000/load?variable_id=1" # stop containers docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yaml down

what: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
text: createDdl, createForeignKeys, createPrimaryKeys functions return character string containing respective DDL SQL code OHDSQL dialect specific CDM version. SQL generate needs rendered translated can executed.

title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
code: createDdl(cdmVersion, cdmDatabaseSchema)  createPrimaryKeys(cdmVersion, cdmDatabaseSchema)  createForeignKeys(cdmVersion, cdmDatabaseSchema)

title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
text: cdmVersion version CDM creating, e.g. 5.3, 5.4 cdmDatabaseSchema name CDM database schema (e.g., "omop_cdm_schema")

title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
text: character string containing OHDSQL DDL string containing OHDSQL creation primary keys OMOP CDM. string containing OHDSQL creation foreign keys OMOP CDM.

title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
text: DDL SQL code created two csv files detail OMOP CDM Specifications. files also form basis CDM documentation Data Quality Dashboard.

title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
text: createPrimaryKeys(): createPrimaryKeys Returns string containing OHDSQL creation primary keys OMOP CDM. createForeignKeys(): createForeignKeys Returns string containing OHDSQL creation foreign keys OMOP CDM.

title: Create the OHDSI-SQL Common Data Model DDL code — createDdl
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ ddl <- createDdl("5.4") pk <- createPrimaryKeys("5.4") fk <- createForeignKeys("5.4") } # }

what: List SQL dialects supported by this package — listSupportedDialects
title: List SQL dialects supported by this package — listSupportedDialects
text: Returns SQL dialects supported via SqlRender, package can use generate dialect-specific DDL.

title: List SQL dialects supported by this package — listSupportedDialects
List SQL dialects supported by this package — listSupportedDialects
text: character vector supported SQL dialects.

what: List OMOP CDM versions supported by this package — listSupportedVersions
title: List OMOP CDM versions supported by this package — listSupportedVersions
text: Returns list OMOP Common Data Model versions package provides DDL constraint support.

title: List OMOP CDM versions supported by this package — listSupportedVersions
List OMOP CDM versions supported by this package — listSupportedVersions
text: character vector supported CDM versions (e.g., "5.3", "5.4").

title: Write DDL script — writeDdl
text: Write DDL SQL file. SQL rendered (parameters replaced) translated target SQL dialect. default @cdmDatabaseSchema parameter kept SQL file needs replaced execution.

title: Write DDL script — writeDdl
code: writeDdl(   targetDialect,   cdmVersion,   outputfolder,   cdmDatabaseSchema = "@cdmDatabaseSchema" )  writePrimaryKeys(   targetDialect,   cdmVersion,   outputfolder,   cdmDatabaseSchema = "@cdmDatabaseSchema" )  writeForeignKeys(   targetDialect,   cdmVersion,   outputfolder,   cdmDatabaseSchema = "@cdmDatabaseSchema" )  writeIndex(   targetDialect,   cdmVersion,   outputfolder,   cdmDatabaseSchema = "@cdmDatabaseSchema" )

title: Write DDL script — writeDdl
text: targetDialect dialect target database. Support dialects specified SqlRender::listSupportedDialects cdmVersion version CDM creating, e.g. 5.3, 5.4 outputfolder directory folder SQL file saved. cdmDatabaseSchema schema CDM instance DDL run. example, "ohdsi.dbo" testing sql server. Defaults "@cdmDatabaseSchema"

title: Write DDL script — writeDdl
text: Writes SQL file OMOP CDM DDL specified CDM version target dialect output folder. Writes SQL file primary keys OMOP CDM based specified target dialect CDM version. Writes SQL file foreign keys OMOP CDM based specified target dialect CDM version. Writes SQL file indices OMOP CDM based specified target dialect CDM version.

title: Write DDL script — writeDdl
text: writePrimaryKeys(): writePrimaryKeys Write SQL code creates primary keys file. writeForeignKeys(): writeForeignKeys Write SQL code creates foreign keys file. writeIndex(): writeIndex Write rendered translated sql creates recommended indexes file.
